#!/usr/bin/env python3



def sum_even_ways(N, M):
    return N * M


N, M = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
print(sum_even_ways(N, M))

N, M = map(int, input().split())

print(N * M)


def sum_even_ways(N, M, P):
    return N*M*P

N, M, P = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
print(sum_even_ways(N, M, P))


N, M = map(int, input().split())

print(N * (M + 1))
